Three stars of the game:
1st star: Tyler Seguin
2nd star: Nolan Patrick
3rd star: Michael Frolik
               
Notes for Dallas Stars:
-Tyler Seguin scored his 10th goal of the season.
-Tyler Seguin finally ended his 10 game goal drought.
-John Klingberg finally ended his 19 game goal drought.
-Mattias Janmark finally ended his 25 game goal drought.
-Mattias Janmark finally ended his 10 game point drought.

Notes for New Jersey Devils:
-Marcus Foligno has marked a new career high in assists with 14 assists.
-Kyle Palmieri scored his 15th goal of the season.
-Kyle Palmieri ended his 6 game goal drought.
